baharen hidi pilissi miyagiya bawata thorathura angawa shri lankawata genawith amunugoda susana bhumiye mihidan kala ek daru mawakage maranaya saka sahitha bawa age mawa prakasha kala bawin, ema kanthawage maranaya pilibanda adala baharen rohalen waidya warthawak labaganima sandaha baharen hi shri lanka thanapathiwarayata niyoga kala gampaha pradhana mahesthrath mohomad maki mahatha ee sandaha wu lipiya widesha katayuthu amathyanshayata yawana lesa niyama kaleya.baharen ratedi thama samiya samanga ekata jiwathwa sitiyadi amunugoda, woshintha thushari (37) namathi ekdaru mawage maranaya saka sahitha bawata karana lada paminillaka matha me wibhagaya pawathwe.marana kariyage mawa wenuwen adhikaranayata karunu dakwu nithignya barni alwis mahathmiya pawasuwe marana kariyage purushaya athadanguwata gena ho me siduwima helikara gatha haki bawaya.me maranaya gana saka bawata karana lada paminillak matha meyata pera wathawakadi gampaha wadabalana mahesthrath nimal ranasinha mahatha hamuwe mruthadehaya godata gena pashchath marana parikshanayak pawathwana men ragama rohale adhikarana waidya niladhariya wetha niyoga kota thibuni.me naduwa pilibanda adala wartha laba ganna thuru nawatha wimasima 2012 pebarawari 21 dinata kal thabini.
